column1: message from blog: I love it!
message from blog: Thank you! This turned out to be one of my favorite books of the year!
song recommendation: suga's interlude by yoongi. put it in the playlist: when you're reading, writing or studying. message: it just released today and it's super calming.
song recommendation: always by rm. put it in the playlist: when you're sad and melancholic. message: it's always calms me down
song recommendation: rm by mono. put it in the playlist: when you want to sing along. message: amazing
